languages.text: {n}Паскаль хранит торжественное молчание, но быстрое щелканье клешни {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендрита{/g} выдает, в каком волнении он пребывает, оказавшись так близко к священному {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}археотеху{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Паскаль хранит торжественное молчание, но быстрое щелканье клешни {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}мехадендрита{/g} выдает, в каком волнении он пребывает, оказавшись так близко к священному археотеху.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal keeps his solemn silence, but the quick clicking of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g}'s claw betrays his excitement at being so close to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal schweigt weiter ernst, doch das schnelle Klicken der Klauen seiner {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}Mechadendriten{/g} gibt preis, wie aufgeregt es ihn macht, der heiligen {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}Archäotech{/g} so nah zu sein.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal garde le silence, mais les cliquetis rapides de la mâchoire de sa {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadendrite{/g} trahissent son excitation de se trouver si proche de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archéotechnologie{/g} sacrée.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal garde le silence, mais les cliquetis rapides de la mâchoire de sa {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mécadentrite{/g} trahissent sa nervosité de se trouver si proche de l'{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archéotech{/g} sacré.{/n}

languages.text: {n}得知自己如此接近神圣的{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}远古科技{/g}时，尽管帕斯卡依然保持着庄严的沉默，但他{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}机械触须{/g}的爪子快速的合拢声，却透露出他心中的兴奋。{/n}

languages.text: {n}パスカルは厳かに沈黙を守っていたが、彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}は素早く唸り、聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}技術遺産{/g}に近づいた興奮を隠せずにいた。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal keeps his solemn silence, but the quick clicking of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g}'s claw betrays his excitement at being so close to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}パスカルは厳かに沈黙を守っていたが、彼の{g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}機械触手{/g}は素早く唸り、その爪は彼の不安を裏切って聖なる{g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}技術遺産{/g}へと迫った。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal guarda solemne silencio, pero el rápido chasquido de la garra de su {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadendrita{/g} delata su emoción por estar tan cerca de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arqueotecnología{/g}.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal keeps his solemn silence, but the quick clicking of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g}'s claw betrays his excitement at being so close to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal guarda solemne silencio, pero el rápido chasquido de la garra de su {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mecadentrita{/g} delata su inquietud por estar tan cerca de la sagrada {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arqueotecnología{/g}.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Pasqal, sessiz ciddiyetini korusa da {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentritinin{/g} pençelerinin hızlı tıkırdayışı, kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arkeoteke{/g} bu kadar yakın oluşundan dolayı hissettiği heyecanı ele veriyor.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Pasqal keeps his solemn silence, but the quick clicking of his {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mechadendrite{/g}'s claw betrays his excitement at being so close to the sacred {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}archeotech{/g}.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Pasqal vakur sessizliğini koruyor ancak {g|Encyclopedia:Mechadendrite}mekadentrit{/g}inin pençelerinin hızlı tıkırdayışı, kutsal {g|Encyclopedia:Archeotech}arkeotek{/g}e bu kadar yakın oluşunun yarattığı heyecanı gizlemesini imkânsız kılıyor.{/n}
